translations: 多种感觉的；使用多种感觉器官的

sentences.sentence: The second, multisensory, method used touch as well as vision for the perception of the visual stimuli.
sentences.translation: 第二种，“多感官法”，不但使用视觉，还使用触觉来感知视觉刺激。

sentences.sentence: This paper proposes a multisensory virtual reality(VR) system which can provide users with senses of vision, audition and force.
sentences.translation: 建立了一个基于视觉、听觉和力觉融合的多感知虚拟现实系统。

sentences.sentence: He considers shopping at grocery stores, in the presence of "rotting" produce, a "multisensory living nightmare", and no longer owns a fridge.
sentences.translation: 站在一堆“腐烂”的农产品面前，让他觉得在杂货商店购物就像在做一场纠结的，活生生的恶梦，因此他再也不使用冰箱了。
